resources.string: Brain training game is basic math game that provides the user with a random expression based on the difficulty level and the user is expected to provide the correct answer. There is also a timer which gives you 10 seconds to complete a single question, fail to do so within the time will award you 0 points and proceed to the next question. Once 10 expressions are completed your final score will be displayed.\n\nCreated By : Praveen Naresh
